name: GET/SET
description:
You work inside of a computer.
Your job? Getting and setting values—but there's a twist.
Values are stored inside heavy chunks of memory that you have to push around! Press buttons, surf conveyor belts, and weave around dangerous errors in your journey to get and set all the values!

Quick PSA: The HTML version can occasionally (very rarely) have some buggy collision. Be warned.

CONTROLS
=========================
Arrows/Numpad to move
R to restart level
Esc to go back to menu/level select
Enter to interact with the menu
